LanguageData.WorkSpeedGlobal.label: Velocidad de trabajo general
LanguageData.WorkSpeedGlobal.description: Un multiplicador sobre la velocidad general de cualquier trabajo.
LanguageData.MiningSpeed.label: Velocidad de minería
LanguageData.MiningSpeed.description: Un multiplicador sobre la velocidad a la que esta persona mina las rocas.
LanguageData.MiningYield.label: mining yield
LanguageData.MiningYield.description: The percentage yield a miner will achieve. This applies to both wall mining and deep drill mining. This doesn't affect the rate of mining rock chunks.
LanguageData.SmoothingSpeed.label: Velocidad de alisar
LanguageData.SmoothingSpeed.description: Un multiplicador sobre a la velocidad a la que esta persona alisar el suelo.
LanguageData.ResearchSpeed.label: Velocidad de investigación
LanguageData.ResearchSpeed.description: Un multiplicador sobre a la velocidad a la que esta persona investiga.
LanguageData.AnimalGatherSpeed.label: animal gather speed
LanguageData.AnimalGatherSpeed.description: The speed at which this person milks, shears, and otherwise gathers resources from animals.
LanguageData.AnimalGatherYield.label: animal gather yield
LanguageData.AnimalGatherYield.description: The percentage yield someone receives when they shear, milk, or otherwise gather resources from a living animal. Higher percentages reduce the chance of wasting the product.
LanguageData.PlantWorkSpeed.label: Velocidad de agricultura
LanguageData.PlantWorkSpeed.description: Un multiplicador sobre a la velocidad a la que esta persona planta y cosecha las plantas.
LanguageData.PlantHarvestYield.label: plant harvest yield
LanguageData.PlantHarvestYield.description: The yield someone gets when harvesting plants. Low yields give a chance that this person will accidentally waste the harvest.
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeed.label: Velocidad de construcción
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeed.description: Un multiplicador sobre a la velocidad a la que esta persona construye estructuras.
LanguageData.ConstructSuccessChance.label: construct success chance
LanguageData.ConstructSuccessChance.description: The chance that this person will succeed in constructing something. Failing means wasting time and resources.
LanguageData.FixBrokenDownBuildingSuccessChance.label: repair success chance
LanguageData.FixBrokenDownBuildingSuccessChance.descr: The chance that this person will successfully repair a broken down building using a component. Failing means wasting time and resources. Note that this only applies to repairing breakdowns, which is different from repairing damage.
